Package projetofinalpoo

Class ConferenceArticleBook

java.lang.Object
projetofinalpoo.Publication
projetofinalpoo.Book
projetofinalpoo.ConferenceArticleBook
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Publication>
public class ConferenceArticleBook
extends Book
A ConferenceArticleBook is a child class of the Book class (which is a child class of the Publication class) so it inherits their methods and variables. A BookChapter is represented by its chapter name, its starting page, its ending page and all the variables that define a Book and a Publication. Besides gets, sets, constructors and toSting() methods it only implements the abstract method impactFactorCalculator().
See Also:
Publication, Book, Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • ConferenceArticleBook

      public ConferenceArticleBook()
      Sole Constructor

    • ConferenceArticleBook

      public ConferenceArticleBook​(java.lang.String title, java.util.List<Researcher> author, java.lang.String summary, java.util.List<java.lang.String> keywords, int publicationYear, int audience, java.lang.String publisher, java.lang.String isbn, java.lang.String conferenceName, int numberOfArticles)
      Constructor that initializes the ConferenceArticle, Book and Publications values (title, author, summary, keywords, publicationYear, audience, isbn, publisher, chapterName, startingPage and finalPage)
      Parameters:
      title - name of the title
      author - List of Researcher objects that made this BookChapter
      summary - description of this BookChapter
      keywords - List of Strings that describe this BookChapter
      publicationYear - year that this BookChapter was published
      audience - quantity of people to which this BookChapter was shown to
      isbn - the identifying code of a book
      publisher - name of the entity that published the Book where this BookChapter is
      conferenceName - name of the conference of which this book article is based of
      numberOfArticles - number of articles that make up the book

    • impactFactorCalculator

      public java.lang.String impactFactorCalculator()
      Description copied from class: Publication
      Method that will calculate a Publication's child factor of impact
      Overrides:
      impactFactorCalculator in class Book
      Returns:

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Method that describes the characteristics of a ConferenceArticleBook. It returns a string in the following format:

      Title : __, Summary : __, Type : __

      Keywords : __

      Authors : __, Publication Year : __

      Publisher : __, ISBN : __

      Conference name : __, Number of articles : __ Note: __ is the place where the values are going to appear (they change object to object)

      Overrides:
      toString in class Book
      Returns:
      a String that describes a ConferenceArticleBook object
